name: Family Ties
storyline:
Family Requests: Your children's wishes, your spouse's shopping list, even your pet's treats... Be ready for requests that can pop up anytime, anywhere! Remember, the happiness of your family is in your hands!

Morale: The morale of your family members is in your hands! If you don't fulfill their wishes, the atmosphere at home can change instantly. Remember, an unhappy family means a disarrayed home! Successfully complete your tasks and transform your home into a loving environment.

Scheme: On an ordinary day, as life flows at its own pace, you suddenly find yourself in the midst of a complex scheme. Everything turns upside down all of a sudden, and now, to solve the mystery, you need to earn money and gather clues, and to gather clues, you need money. Uncover the real enemies behind your family. And remember, a true hero knows how to reclaim what is rightfully theirs!

Money: In this strange world ruled by money, it's time to earn income by showcasing your skills! Keep the morale of your family members high; if necessary, work together and strengthen both your earnings and your family bonds.

Strengthen Your Family Bonds! This game presents a funny and touching story where an ordinary father embarks on an extraordinary adventure. While completing tasks, you'll not only interact with your family members but also encounter funny characters, solve mysterious events, and, of course, strive to be the hero of your family. This entertaining game provides an experience that makes you laugh, think, and strengthens your family bonds.
summary: Discover the power within you, challenge the hardships of life, and keep your family together in this epic game called 'Family Ties.' Take on the challenging tasks that await you and seize control of your life. Stand strong in the face of life's sudden twists because there's a hero within you!
